message_notFoundIdentifierText: No story could be found with the id
message_notFoundReasonText: This story may have been deleted, or your id may be incorrect.
message_important_notes_body:
* Your published story will be licensed under CC BY 4.0.
* You won't be able to make changes to your story once you publish.
* You can have your story removed by emailing stories@idrc.ocadu.ca
message_etiquette_body:
* Avoid identifying information such as names and addresses in your story.
* Don't publish photos or video of other people without their explicit consent.
* Avoid content that threatens or intimidates any person or suggests violence, hatred or discrimination toward other people.
message_editor_instructions_text:
Start building your story here!

Select the icons above to add blocks of various types such as text and images to your story.
message_editor_notice_text: **NOTE:** The story builder tool is in sandbox mode at the moment. Stories will be deleted every 24 hours. If you would like to use the Story Building Tool in your community, organization, school or classroom please email Caren at stories@idrc.ocadu.ca

authenticationValidationErrors.error_email_format: The email address format is incorrect.
authenticationValidationErrors.error_email_length: The email address is too short, it must be at least 3 characters long.
authenticationValidationErrors.error_password_length: The password is too short, it must be at least 8 characters long.
authenticationValidationErrors.error_password_confirmation_length: The password confirmation is too short, it must be at least 8 characters long.
authenticationValidationErrors.error_password_confirmation_mismatch: The password and password confirmation do not match

authenticationServerErrors.400: Log in failed: An invalid request was received by the server. Please check the inputs are correct.
authenticationServerErrors.409: Log in failed: An account is already logged in. To log in again, please first log out.
authenticationServerErrors.error_undefined: Log in failed: An unexpected error has occurred.
